name: karotten-kasino
description: This project was generated with [Angular CLI](https://github.com/angular/angular-cli) version 12.0.3.

scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.build-frontend: npm run lint-frontend && npm run dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint-backend && npm run lint-frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --force
